sourcesContent:
cv-view works!

import {Component, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import {DataService} from "../services/data.service"; import {Observable} from "rxjs"; import {IFilter, IProfile, ISectionData} from "../interfaces/cv-interfaces"; @Component({ selector: 'app-cv-view', templateUrl: './cv-view.component.html', styleUrls: ['./cv-view.component.css'] }) export class CvViewComponent implements OnInit { private _dataService: DataService; public sections$: Observable>; public fakeData: Array = [ { sectionName: 'blah', data: [ { title: 'firstJob', organisation: 'firstOrg', startDate: '2021-01-01', endDate: '2022-02-02', detailList: [ { description: 'asdadsdaasdadasd', tags: ['technical', 'organisation'] }, { description: 'basldjbasdkashdj', tags: ['technical'] }, { description: 'ccccccbsmdcshdbjshdbsg', tags: ['teamwork'] } ] } ] }] public profileData: IProfile; public availableFilters: Array = [{value: 'technical', active: false}, {value: 'organisation', active: false}, {value: 'teamwork', active: false}] private _activeFilters: Array = ['organisation'] public showFilterOptions: boolean = false; constructor(dataService: DataService) { this._dataService = dataService } public ngOnInit(): void { this.profileData = this._dataService.getProfile(); this.sections$ = this._dataService.cvSections$; } public filter(): void { this._dataService.filterData(this._activeFilters) this.showFilterOptions = false; } }
